text: Goodnight Goodnight is the fifth single by pop-rock band Maroon 5 on the album It Won't Be Soon Before Long. The song was released August 2008. The song is also the 8th track off the album. == Video == The music video was releasd August 21st, 2008. The video deals with a "before and after" sequence of a relationship between Levine and his girlfriend, Bailey. In the "before" part she was beautiful and in the "after" one they set apart, but he is still in love with her. == Discography == *"If I Never See Your Face Again" (2008) *"Goodnight Goodnight" (2008) Category:Maroon 5 songs Category:2008 songs
title: Goodnight Goodnight
